name: RTS Football
description: RTS Football is a video game that blends the challenge of the real-time strategy (RTS) genre with American football. Taking place in a futuristic world where robots have taken the field in an epic battle for supremacy, and of course, touchdowns, RTS Football offers all the classic features of a 2D RTS game, including but not limited to resource management, unit management, and unit creation. But with a twist: players command a team of of robots that each serve a role in different positions on the field, the objective being to outmaneuver the opposing team in order to score and not turn the ball over.
